ShadowSiren:Ambush.NAME: Ambush
ShadowSiren:Ambush.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] and !M! Vigor.
ShadowSiren:Ambush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain [E] [E] and !M! Vigor.

ShadowSiren:ArcaneShelter.NAME: Arcane Shelter
ShadowSiren:ArcaneShelter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [DarkIcon] Block X times. NL Gain X Dexterity this turn. NL (Gain !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! Block and !ShadowSiren:ThirdMagic! Dexterity this turn)

ShadowSiren:ArtOfWar.NAME: Art Of War
ShadowSiren:ArtOfWar.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each *Attack played this turn. NL (Gain !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! Block)

ShadowSiren:AutoArmor.NAME: Auto-Armor
ShadowSiren:AutoArmor.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL Whenever you would lose HP, lose !M! less.

ShadowSiren:BlackHole.NAME: Black Hole
ShadowSiren:BlackHole.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Deal !D! [DarkIcon] damage plus !M! for each removed debuff to ALL enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL your debuffs. NL Deal !D! [DarkIcon] damage plus !M! for each removed debuff to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:BlackMagic.NAME: Black Magic
ShadowSiren:BlackMagic.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, increase its amount by !M!.

ShadowSiren:BlackRose.NAME: Black Roses
ShadowSiren:BlackRose.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Shadow *Split. NL Exhaust.
ShadowSiren:BlackRose.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Shadow *Split.

ShadowSiren:BlastBurn.NAME: Blast Burn
ShadowSiren:BlastBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [FireIcon] damage. NL Halve the targets Max HP and convert any HP lost this way to Temporary_HP.

ShadowSiren:Blitz.NAME: Blitz
ShadowSiren:Blitz.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! time. NL Increase this cards cost and hits by 1 this combat. NL shadowsiren:Reshuffle.
ShadowSiren:Blitz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Increase this cards cost and hits by 1 this combat. NL shadowsiren:Reshuffle.

ShadowSiren:BrickBreaker.NAME: Brick Breaker
ShadowSiren:BrickBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Apply !B! Block. NL Add !M! *Hammer to your hand.

ShadowSiren:Cataclysm.NAME: Cataclysm
ShadowSiren:Cataclysm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [ElectricIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain [E] for each enemy this kills.

ShadowSiren:ChainShock.NAME: Chain Shock
ShadowSiren:ChainShock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [ElectricIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:ChargeUp.NAME: Charge Up
ShadowSiren:ChargeUp.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! shadowsiren:Charge to a card in your hand.

ShadowSiren:CreepingShadows.NAME: Creeping Shadows
ShadowSiren:CreepingShadows.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! temporary Strength and Dexterity.

ShadowSiren:Cryogenesis.NAME: Cryogenesis
ShadowSiren:Cryogenesis.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block from cards, gain !M! more. NL Block you gain also becomes [IceIcon] Block.
ShadowSiren:Cryogenesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you gain Block from cards, gain !M! more. NL Block you gain also becomes [IceIcon] Block.

ShadowSiren:DireStrike.NAME: Dire Strike
ShadowSiren:DireStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have a debuff, deal !D! damage again.

ShadowSiren:Discharge.NAME: Discharge
ShadowSiren:Discharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [ElectricIcon] damage. NL shadowsiren:Charge affects this card !M! times.

ShadowSiren:ElementalBurst.NAME: Elemental Burst
ShadowSiren:ElementalBurst.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each active shadowsiren:Element.

ShadowSiren:EnergizingFlush.NAME: Energized Flush
ShadowSiren:EnergizingFlush.DESCRIPTION: Lose all active shadowsiren:Elements. NL Gain [E] for each shadowsiren:Element lost.
ShadowSiren:EnergizingFlush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose all active shadowsiren:Elements. NL Gain [E] for each shadowsiren:Element lost.

ShadowSiren:EnergyConversion.NAME: Energy Conversion
ShadowSiren:EnergyConversion.DESCRIPTION: At the beginning of your turn, activate the shadowsiren:Charge of all cards in play.
ShadowSiren:EnergyConversion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the beginning of your turn, activate the shadowsiren:Charge of all cards in play.

ShadowSiren:FireOrb.NAME: Fire Orb
ShadowSiren:FireOrb.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Attack shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Deal !D! [FireIcon] damage. NL *Skill shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Gain !M! Vigor.

ShadowSiren:FlashFire.NAME: Flash Fire
ShadowSiren:FlashFire.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! [FireIcon] damage. NL If the target has full HP, deal !D! [FireIcon] damage again.

ShadowSiren:Frostbite.NAME: Frostbite
ShadowSiren:Frostbite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [IceIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal !D! [IceIcon] damage again to ALL enemies that have Weak or *Chill.

ShadowSiren:Glaciate.NAME: Glaciate
ShadowSiren:Glaciate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [IceIcon] damage !M! time. NL If the target has Weak, increase this cards hits by !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! this combat.
ShadowSiren:Glaciate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [IceIcon] damage !M! times. NL If the target has Weak, increase this cards hits by !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! this combat.

ShadowSiren:Hammer.NAME: Hammer
ShadowSiren:Hammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has Block, deal !D! damage again. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:HammerBag.NAME: Hammer Bag
ShadowSiren:HammerBag.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Skill shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Add a *Hammer to your hand.

ShadowSiren:HammerToss.NAME: Hammer Toss
ShadowSiren:HammerToss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Add !M! *Hammer to your hand.

ShadowSiren:IceOrb.NAME: Ice Orb
ShadowSiren:IceOrb.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL *Attack shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Deal !D! [IceIcon] damage. NL *Skill shadowsiren:Follow-Up: NL Gain !B! Block.

ShadowSiren:Immolate.NAME: Immolate
ShadowSiren:Immolate.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack, the target loses !M! Max HP.

ShadowSiren:Infatuate.NAME: Infatuate
ShadowSiren:Infatuate.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:MagicCloak.NAME: Magic Cloak
ShadowSiren:MagicCloak.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gains !M! times more Block if you have a debuff.

ShadowSiren:MagneticStrike.NAME: Magnetic Strike
ShadowSiren:MagneticStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [IceIcon] [ElectricIcon] damage. NL Deals 50% more damage if the target has Block.

ShadowSiren:Overheat.NAME: Overheat
ShadowSiren:Overheat.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage of the next *Attack you play by !M! this combat. NL If it has no shadowsiren:Element, it becomes a *Fire card.

ShadowSiren:PatchUp.NAME: Patch Up
ShadowSiren:PatchUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Temporary_HP. NL Scales with Block modifiers. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:Permafrost.NAME: Permafrost
ShadowSiren:Permafrost.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain [IceIcon] Block equal to Weak applied.

ShadowSiren:PiezoCapacitor.NAME: Piezo Capacitor
ShadowSiren:PiezoCapacitor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! shadowsiren:Charge to a random card in your draw pile.

ShadowSiren:PlasmaBeam.NAME: Plasma Beam
ShadowSiren:PlasmaBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [FireIcon] [ElectricIcon] damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:PocketDimension.NAME: Pocket Dimension
ShadowSiren:PocketDimension.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change active shadowsiren:Elements, draw !M! card.
ShadowSiren:PocketDimension.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change active shadowsiren:Elements, draw !M! cards.

ShadowSiren:Polychrome.NAME: Polychrome
ShadowSiren:Polychrome.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [FireIcon] Block. NL Gain !B! [IceIcon] Block. NL Gain !B! [ElectricIcon] Block. NL Gain !B! [DarkIcon] Block. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:PureStrike.NAME: Pure Strike
ShadowSiren:PureStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 50% more damage if you have no active shadowsiren:Element.

ShadowSiren:Recuperate.NAME: Recuperate
ShadowSiren:Recuperate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [DarkIcon] Block. NL Remove !M! debuff if you have any, otherwise draw !M! card.
ShadowSiren:Recuperate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! [DarkIcon] Block. NL Remove up to !M! debuffs if you have any, otherwise draw up to !M! cards.

ShadowSiren:Reversal.NAME: Reversal
ShadowSiren:Reversal.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage plus half the targets intent. NL (Deals !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! damage)

ShadowSiren:ShadowOrb.NAME: Shadow Orb
ShadowSiren:ShadowOrb.DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL When Retained, remove !M! debuff if you have any.
ShadowSiren:ShadowOrb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: *Uses !ShadowSiren:UsesCount! NL When Retained, remove up to !M! debuffs if you have any.

ShadowSiren:ShadowSneak.NAME: Shadow Sneak
ShadowSiren:ShadowSneak.DESCRIPTION: Autoplay. NL Deal !D! [DarkIcon] damage to a random enemy. NL shadowsiren:Intensify damage by !M!.

ShadowSiren:ShadowTag.NAME: Shadow Tag
ShadowSiren:ShadowTag.DESCRIPTION: Put a random *Attack from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL If it has no shadowsiren:Element, it becomes a *Shadow card.

ShadowSiren:ShieldConversion.NAME: Shield Conversion
ShadowSiren:ShieldConversion.DESCRIPTION: Lose all active shadowsiren:Elements. NL Gain !B! Block for each shadowsiren:Element lost.

ShadowSiren:Singe.NAME: Singe
ShadowSiren:Singe.DESCRIPTION: Target loses !M! HP and twice that much Max HP. NL Effect scales with Vigor.

ShadowSiren:SinisterReflection.NAME: Sinister Reflection
ShadowSiren:SinisterReflection.DESCRIPTION: When an enemy applies a debuff to you, it is also applied to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:SpiritDrain.NAME: Spirit Drain
ShadowSiren:SpiritDrain.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Gain Strength this turn equal to amount removed.

ShadowSiren:StarFall.NAME: Star Fall
ShadowSiren:StarFall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times for each active shadowsiren:Element. NL (Hits !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! times)
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times for each active shadowsiren:Element. NL (Hits !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! time)

ShadowSiren:Thunderstruck.NAME: Thunderstruck
ShadowSiren:Thunderstruck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [ElectricIcon] damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL shadowsiren:Reshuffle.

ShadowSiren:TriAttack.NAME: Tri Attack
ShadowSiren:TriAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [FireIcon] damage. NL Deal !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! [IceIcon] damage. NL Deal !ShadowSiren:ThirdMagic! [ElectricIcon] damage. NL shadowsiren:Intensify damage by !M!.

ShadowSiren:Trick.NAME: Trick
ShadowSiren:Trick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [DarkIcon] damage. NL Remove !M! debuff if you have any, otherwise draw !M! card.
ShadowSiren:Trick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [DarkIcon] damage. NL Remove up to !M! debuffs if you have any, otherwise draw up to !M! cards.

ShadowSiren:TurboCharged.NAME: Turbo Charged
ShadowSiren:TurboCharged.DESCRIPTION: Apply X shadowsiren:Charge to all cards in your hand. NL (Applies !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! shadowsiren:Charge) NL Exhaust.
ShadowSiren:TurboCharged.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply X shadowsiren:Charge to all cards in your hand. NL (Applies !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! shadowsiren:Charge)

ShadowSiren:VigorousShift.NAME: Vigorous Shift
ShadowSiren:VigorousShift.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you change active shadowsiren:Elements, gain !M! Vigor.

ShadowSiren:Vulcanize.NAME: Vulcanize
ShadowSiren:Vulcanize.DESCRIPTION: Unblocked [FireIcon] damage causes enemies to lose 25% more Max HP.

ShadowSiren:WhiteOut.NAME: White Out
ShadowSiren:WhiteOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! [IceIcon] [DarkIcon] damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

ShadowSiren:WildMagic.NAME: Wild Magic
ShadowSiren:WildMagic.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL shadowsiren:Intensify damage by !M! for each active shadowsiren:Element.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Lose all active shadowsiren:Elements. NL Deal !D! damage. NL shadowsiren:Intensify damage by !M! for each shadowsiren:Element lost.

ShadowSiren:EarthTremor.NAME: Earth Tremor
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: *Star *Power: 1 NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

ShadowSiren:ShowStopper.NAME: Show Stopper
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: *Star *Power: 3 NL Kill ALL enemies under !M! HP.

ShadowSiren:SuperNova.NAME: Super Nova
ShadowSiren:SuperNova.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: *Star *Power: 5 NL Deal !M! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

ShadowSiren:SweetFeast.NAME: Sweet Feast
ShadowSiren:SweetFeast.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Gain !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! Regen
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: *Star *Power: 4 NL Heal !M! HP. NL Gain [E] [E] . NL Gain !ShadowSiren:SecondMagic! Regen
